structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
SHERIFFS, CONSTABLES, AND COUNTY POLICE FORCE

law.catch_line: School and student safety issues training encouraged.
law.text: The sheriff in each county is encouraged to receive training on issues pertaining to school and student safety, and shall be invited to meet annually with local school superintendents to discuss emergency response plans and emergency response concerns.
law.history: Created 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 126, sec. 7, effective June 25, 2013; and ch. 133, sec. 7, effective June 25, 2013.

metadata.lrc-note: (6/25/2013). This statute was created with identical text in 2013 Ky. Acts chs. 126 and 133, which were companion bills. These Acts have been codified together.
